subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski put himself on the verge of his first Nascar Sprint Cup title Sunday after a blown tire caused the points leader, Jimmie Johnson, to crash at Phoenix International Raceway.
snippet: Brad Keselowski put himself on the verge of his first Nascar Sprint Cup title Sunday after a blown tire caused the points leader, Jimmie Johnson, to crash at Phoenix International Raceway.
